Name: BROTHER WAKE UP
About the game: Tonight, your younger brother was cursed with the Watchmaker's spell. The curse will keep him from waking up and turn his dreams into nightmares. You must collect all parts of the old watches. Only then will the Watchmaker's spell be reversed and your brother wakes up. I must warn you; it won't be easy. There are winding mazes, and the sullen silence will have you listening to every rustle. Trolling monsters screaming in corridors is the way you'll know how close these creepy beasts are. Search high and low. Check every room to find the hidden parts. Beware the Watchmaker's sidekicks! They'll hinder your search and follow you every step of the way.
